quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.quote: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
quotes.known_for: Creating the Linux kernel and being the initial developer of the Git version control system.

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.quote: Measuring programming progress by lines of code is like measuring aircraft building progress by weight.
quotes.known_for: Co-founding Microsoft and playing a key role in the development of the personal computer revolution.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Everybody in this country should learn to program a computer, because it teaches you how to think.
quotes.known_for: Co-founding Apple and helping to revolutionize the personal computer, music, and mobile phone industries.

quotes.author: Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: The most damaging phrase in the language is: 'It's always been done that way.'
quotes.known_for: Her pioneering work in computer science, including helping to develop early programming languages and playing a key role in the development of COBOL.

quotes.author: Alan Turing
quotes.quote: We can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see plenty there that needs to be done.
quotes.known_for: His groundbreaking work in computer science and cryptography, including helping to develop the concept of a programmable digital computer.

quotes.author: Donald Knuth
quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.known_for: His work in computer science and mathematics, including developing the TeX computer typesetting system and writing the multi-volume book series 'The Art of Computer Programming.'

quotes.author: Ada Lovelace
quotes.quote: The analytical engine has no pretensions to originate anything. It can do whatever we know how to order it to perform.
quotes.known_for: Her work in computer science and mathematics, including developing the first algorithm intended to be processed by a machine and recognizing the potential for computers to do more than just basic calculations.

quotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup
quotes.quote: In C++ it's harder to shoot yourself in the foot, but when you do, you blow off your whole leg.
quotes.known_for: Developing the C++ programming language and for his work in object-oriented programming.

quotes.author: Larry Wall
quotes.quote: There's more than one way to do it.
quotes.known_for: Creating the Perl programming language and for his work in computer science and linguistics.

quotes.author: Margaret Hamilton
quotes.quote: Software engineering is the part of computer science which is too difficult for the computer scientist.
quotes.known_for: Her work as a computer scientist and software engineer, including developing software for the Apollo space program and helping to popularize the term 'software engineering.'
